subject: Re: [junit] Running jUnit suites from maven
msgSnippet: Sorry for the empty reply, misclicked .
messageBody:
Sorry for the empty reply, misclicked >.<
When I used Maven for our 3rd year project, it did run JUnit 4 tests
automatically whenever I ran mvn package, mvn install or mvn compile. Are
you sure the test cases are under src/test/java?

2008/11/22 Jan Kroeze <thejcwk@...>
